content.question: Which of the following groups would mostly likely have supported this proposed amendment?

choices.label: Proponents of the supremacy of federal laws over state laws
Proponents of the expansion of the executive branch powers under the Constitution
Advocates of the power of the Supreme Court to review federal laws
Advocates of limiting federal powers to those specifically written into the Constitution

content.answer: Advocates of limiting federal powers to those specifically written into the Constitution

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
